column1:
• 0.75 cup water, divided
  • 3 (.25 ounce) packages unflavored gelatin
  • 0.66666668653488 cup light corn syrup
  • 2 cups white sugar
  • 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
  • 2 teaspoons peppermint extract
  • 0.25 cup cornstarch
  • 0.25 cup confectioners
  • sugar
column2:
• 8 eggs
  • 2 cups salted butter, softened
  • 1 cup white sugar
  • 1.25 teaspoons almond extract
  • 4 cups all-purpose flour
column3:
• 1 pound macaroni
  • 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup
  • 1.25 cups milk
  • 3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
  • 8 tablespoons butter, divided
  • 0.25 cup dry bread crumbs
column4:
• 0.75 pound lean ground beef
  • 1 (16 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce
  • 1 pound spaghetti
  • 1 cup shredded mild Cheddar cheese
column5:
• 8 ounces lasagna noodles
  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 0.25 cup minced onions
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 0.5 teaspoon garlic salt
  • 1 (32 ounce) jar spaghetti sauce
  • 1 (16 ounce) package large curd cottage cheese
  • 1 pound mozzarella cheese, shredded
column6:
• 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 large onion, minced
  • 4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
  • 1 clove garlic, minced
  • 1 pound lean ground beef
  • 0.5 pound ground pork
  • 1 (28 ounce) can Italian plum tomatoes
  • 0.5 pound fresh mushrooms, sliced
  • 6 ounces tomato sauce
  • 2 carrots, shredded
  • 1 stalk celery, chopped
  • 0.5 cup dry white wine
  • 0.5 cup chicken stock
  • 0.5 teaspoon dried basil
  • 0.5 teaspoon dried oregano
  • salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 pound pasta
